items.name: Discord Forum Integrations
items.description: Integration of Discord forums for Nouns DAO proposals

description: This proposal aims to continue the development of Nerman.js and the Nounish event feed Discord bot for the Nouniverse. The team will focus on improving Nerman.js, indexing on-chain Nouns data, and providing comprehensive documentation on Nerman.wtf. Additionally, they will work on integrating Discord forums for Nouns DAO proposals and implement bonus features.

title: Nerman.js - A Nouns SDK
